title: Verify: Migrate MemoryApplet to Memory Node
description:
Run automated tests for task T-056.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Migrate existing MemoryApplet to the new persistent Memory Node. Implement auto-migration logic for legacy nodes.
Criteria:
- Legacy MemoryApplet nodes are auto-migrated
- No loss of data or configuration
- Memory Node replaces MemoryApplet in all workflows
acceptance_criteria: No loss of data or configuration
Memory Node replaces MemoryApplet in all workflows
